briefTitle: A Double-blind Comparative Study of the Efficacy and Safety of E3810 10mg Once and Twice Daily in Maintenance Therapy for PPI Resistant Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease Patients
officialTitle: A Double-blind Comparative Study of the Efficacy and Safety of E3810 10mg Once and Twice Daily in Maintenance Therapy for PPI Resistant Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease Patients
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of rabeprazole 10mg once and twice daily in maintenance therapy for PPI resistant gastroesophageal reflux disease patients.

effectByArm.arm: Rabeprazole: 10 or 20 mg Twice Daily, Then 10 mg Once Daily
Rabeprazole: 10 or 20 mg Twice Daily, Then 10 mg Twice Daily
